item.description:
Frank Szabo gave an enlightening presentation to our group called "The Power Of The Sheriff". Please support his fund raising efforts. He is offering a 25% discount for the group. They can use the code "RP" and take $25 off per ticket

F-U-Ndraisers For Frank
Szabo For Sheriff

FOUR HOURS OF FAUX GAMBLING
including blackjack, craps, roulette, Texas Hold ‘em and The Money Wheel

Heavy hors d’oeurves and cash bar

Music provided by DJ Dave

Anyone coming in formal attire receives bonus chips to play with.

$100 per person
Go to the campaign donation page at www.SzaboForSheriff.com
Donate $100 for each ticket under "Other" category
Under "Personal Information" indicate whether the payment is for "Manchester" or "Nashua"

Tickets must be purchased at least four (4) days prior to the event. Minimum of 50 people required.

item.name: Frank Szabo's MONTE CARLO NIGHT
